title: Verify whether the list of Source Network Locations Selected is empty by default while creating the Inline Policy, if there are no Network Locations configured in the Tenant
custom_summary: Verify whether the list of Source Network Locations Selected is empty by default while creating the Inline Policy, if there are no Network Locations configured in the Tenant
custom_steps:
1. Login to Tenant WebUI
2. Click on Inline Policies
3. Enter Users. Application/Categories, DLP and Activities
4. Click on Source Network
custom_expected:
1. In the Source Network Popup, the icon showing the number of "Source Network Selected" - should show Zero (0).
2. The pane containing the list of "Source Network Selected" should be empty.
